name: Holiday Taxis
tag_list: airport, transfers, shuttle, minibus, limo, airport-transfers, airport-shuttles, holiday-transfers, hotel-transfers, resort-transfers, taxi-transfers, holiday-taxis, hoiday-shuttles, resort-taxi
overview:
Holiday Taxis offers worldwide Airport, Port & Ski transfers for any occasion.

Holiday Taxis was the pioneer of the pre-booked overseas transfer. It was set up in 2002 in order to meet the burgeoning demand for customers to be able to quickly and effectively pre-book transfers from overseas airports to their hotels, timeshares or private accommodation. Since those early days working exclusively as a Mediterranean specialist, the company has evolved into the market leader and now arranges transfers in over 80 countries worldwide and has transported millions of customers since it began.
